section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.paragraph1: This legal notice governs the use of the XGirl.pt website, owned by XGirl, LDA.
section1.paragraph2: Accessing and browsing the site automatically assigns the status of USER and implies full and unreserved acceptance of all conditions published in this legal notice.
section1.paragraph3: The SITE OWNER may modify these conditions without prior notice.
section1.paragraph4: It is recommended that the USER carefully read this content before using the services and information provided by the site.
section1.paragraph5: The USER agrees to use the site in accordance with the law and this legal notice.

section2.title: 2. Identification
section2.paragraph3: Address: Rua da Liberdade, 123, 1st floor, Lisbon, Portugal.

section4.title: 4. Access and Use Conditions
section4.paragraph1: Access to the site and its services is free of charge.
section4.paragraph2: The USER declares that all provided information is true and authentic.
section4.paragraph3: The USER agrees to properly use the site’s contents and services.
section4.listItem3: Attempt to access restricted areas of the site or third-party systems and extract unauthorized data.
section4.listItem4: Violate intellectual or industrial property rights.
section4.listItem6: Distribute, reproduce, or modify content without express authorization.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: Welcome to XGirl.pt, a platform dedicated to adult entertainment service ads. By accessing and using our site, you accept these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Age Conditions
section2.content: This site is strictly prohibited for individuals under 18 years of age or the legal age of majority in your country of residence. By using this site, you declare that you are of legal age and assume full responsibility for accessing the content.

section3.title: 3. Authorized Use
section3.content:
3.1. The site is exclusively intended for posting adult entertainment service ads in compliance with applicable European Union and advertiser country legislation.
3.2. Posting any ad involving illegal activities, sexual exploitation, human trafficking, child pornography, coercion, or any practice contrary to the law is prohibited.
3.3. The user is responsible for the ad content and must ensure all provided information is truthful and does not infringe on third-party rights.

section4.title: 4. Liability and Moderation
section4.content:
4.1. XGirl.pt is not responsible for the content of ads posted by users but reserves the right to remove or modify any ad that violates these Terms and Conditions.
4.2. We implement moderation mechanisms to ensure posted ads comply with legislation and site policies.

section5.title: 5. Data Protection and Privacy
section5.content:
5.1. The site follows the guidelines of the European Union General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
5.2. Personal information provided by users will be protected according to our Privacy Policy and will not be shared with third parties without prior consent.

section6.title: 6. Payments and Subscriptions
section6.content:
6.1. Some site services may be paid. All financial transactions will be processed securely.
6.2. In case of subscription cancellation, no refunds will be issued for payments already made, except as required by law.

section7.title: 7. Sanctions and Account Removal
section7.content:
7.1. XGirl.pt reserves the right to suspend or remove user accounts that violate these Terms and Conditions without prior notice.
7.2. If you identify any illegal or irregular activity on the site, please contact our support team immediately.

section8.title: 8. Final Provisions
section8.content:
8.1. These Terms and Conditions may be changed at any time. We recommend users review this document periodically.
8.2. Continued use of the site after changes to the Terms and Conditions constitutes acceptance of the changes.
section8.contact: If you have any questions, contact our support team at info@xgirl.pt.

how_it_works.title: How XGirl.pt Works
how_it_works.introduction: Welcome to XGirl.pt, Portugal’s most vibrant and fair erotic classifieds platform! We connect escorts with clients through innovation and safety. What sets us apart? At XGirl, your visibility depends on your energy – the more you engage, the more you shine! With equal opportunities for all advertisers, our Homepage is a dynamic stage where everyone can stand out. Discover how it works, from registration to topping the charts!
how_it_works.section1_description: Your journey starts here! Sign up with an email and password, then customize your profile with flair. Add up to 10 photos in the Premium plan, a unique bio, and your services. At XGirl, you choose how to present yourself as an escort in Portugal. Once registered, your profile can appear on the Homepage – your dedication makes all the difference!
how_it_works.section2_description: The XGirl.pt Homepage is where everything comes alive. Designed to showcase escorts and attract clients, each section promotes fair and dynamic visibility. Explore the elements that make our platform thrive:
how_it_works.section2_welcome_description: The Welcome Section is your first impression at XGirl. A carousel displays profiles sorted by recent tags – update your tag, like “Available now,” to rise to the top! We also feature 4 random Stories from Premium members, refreshed every 12 hours, in animated circles that grab attention with creative videos.
how_it_works.section2_welcome_image: Conceptual image: Animated circles with glowing borders (Stories) next to a carousel of cards with names and recent tags.
how_it_works.section2_stories_description: This section highlights the latest Stories from Premium advertisers. Post a video and capture attention with fresh content! Ordered by upload date, any Premium member can shine with creativity.
how_it_works.section2_stories_image: Conceptual image: Row of video thumbnails with a prominent play button.
how_it_works.section2_featured_description: The Featured Ads are the peak of visibility. Only profiles with the Premium badge appear here, ensuring maximum exposure. Earn 5 extra days of spotlight with the Blog Author badge by creating content. Your effort – updating tags or posting – is rewarded, keeping XGirl fair and exciting!
how_it_works.section2_featured_image: Conceptual image: Banner showcasing Premium profiles with Premium or Blog Author badges.
how_it_works.section2_map_description: The Map displays locations of escorts in Portugal based on profile cities. Clients can easily find nearby advertisers. Add your location to attract those in your area!
how_it_works.section2_map_image: Conceptual image: Stylized map with pink pins marking locations.
how_it_works.section2_newest_description: We showcase the latest profiles on XGirl, sorted by creation date. New escorts get initial visibility, a perfect chance to introduce themselves before competing for spotlight with tags and Stories!
how_it_works.section2_newest_image: Conceptual image: Grid of cards with names and photos of new advertisers.
how_it_works.section3_description: At XGirl.pt, your visibility reflects your effort. Update tags regularly or earn the Blog Author badge to boost your presence. And we’re fair: random Stories (Premium) refresh every 12 hours, and random picks in Featured Ads give everyone a shot at the Homepage. Balance, dedication, and fun define XGirl!
how_it_works.section4_description: Our badges celebrate what makes each advertiser unique. Earn them to display your value:
how_it_works.verified_description: Photo verified by the XGirl.pt team, ensuring authenticity and trust.
how_it_works.premium_description: Premium member with more photos, Stories, and Homepage spotlight.
how_it_works.stories_description: Profile includes Stories, featuring short videos to attract clients.
how_it_works.blog_author_description: Wrote a blog article, earning credibility and 5 extra days of spotlight.
how_it_works.live_cam_description: Offers live videos (WhatsApp, webcam), providing interactivity for clients.
how_it_works.section5_description: After signing up, manage everything effortlessly at XGirl. Reply to messages, update your status (e.g., “Available now”), and control your visibility. Clients find you securely, with everything verified by our team.
how_it_works.section6_description: We’ve got your back! Our team offers dedicated support, and our blog provides exclusive tips for escorts in Portugal. At XGirl, you grow in a fair, empowering, and opportunity-filled community.
how_it_works.call_to_action: Join XGirl.pt now and turn your online presence into pure spotlight!
